## decorations

For text decorations you will need to specify the [text decoration](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration) seperately without using `text-decoration`. Instead you should be using [text-decoration-line](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration-line), [text-decoration-style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration-style), and [text-decoration-thickness](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration-thickness).

<br>

Text decorators make [words pop]{.decoration-yellow style="text-decoration-line: underline;"} 

````md
Text decorators make [words pop]{.decoration-yellow style="text-decoration-line: underline;"} 
````

## Outlines and borders

Outlines and borders work the way way as decorations does. You will likely need to add 

<br>


[border]{.border-red style="border-style: dotted; border-width: 10px;"}

````md
[border]{.border-red style="border-style: dotted; border-width: 10px;"}
````

[outline]{.outline-blue style="outline-style: groove; outline-width: 10px;"}

````md
[outline]{.outline-blue style="outline-style: groove; outline-width: 10px;"}
````
